TaxonIdentification.species_authority: (D. C. Eaton) Brouillet, Urbatsch & R. P. Roberts

treatment.description: Leaves entire. Ray florets white to pale lavender. 2n = 18.
treatment.habitat: rocky slopes and cliff crevices of mountains in subalpine coniferous forests
treatment.discussion: Variety kingii is known only from the Wasatch Mountains, from Mt. Nebo northwards (Juab, Millard, and Salt Lake counties).
